name: OkaeriSpamProtection
description: Anti Spam/NSFW Telegram Bot Written In Python With Pyrogram.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Obtain a Telegram bot oken by contacting @BotFather

NSFW_LOG_CHANNEL.description: ID of the channel where NSFW logs should be forwarded. Ex: '-123456'

SPAM_LOG_CHANNEL.description: ID of the channel where SPAM logs should be forwarded. Ex: '-123456'
